snippet: Florian Homm, who spent five years in hiding, was arrested in Italy and faces extradition to America, where authorities have accused him of defrauding investors of at least $200 million.
abstract: Italian police arrest Florian Homm, flamboyant former hedge fund manager who spent the last five years in hiding; Homm faces extradition to the United States on securities fraud charges that could expose him to a lengthy prison sentence.
lead_paragraph: Florian Homm, who spent five years in hiding, was arrested in Italy and faces extradition to America, where authorities have accused him of defrauding investors of at least $200 million.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Manager Found and Jailed in Fraud
headline.print_headline: Fugitive Hedge Fund Manager Is Arrested
